about.title: Design
about.description: Beautiful UI enhances experience. Every project deserves one. It makes me so happy, And I am obsessed with it.

about.title: Build
about.description: Having a great idea is fantastic. Making it real is even more terrific. Little things can change the world. The spirit of engineers.

about.title: Experiment
about.description: RNA molecules are fascinating. Testing your own hypothesis is fun. Once a biochemist,         always a biochemist.

about.title: Automate
about.description: A rule set by myself: Anything repeated 3 times should be automated. And not just at work.
